name: german-vocabulary-trainer
description: Web application for german wordlist management and vocabulary practice

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../full-stack-open-2023/part-3/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../../fso-2023-part-3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: ffventure
